# [Interview #700: Oslo Signing Report - Thorondir, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=700#5)

#### Thorondir

Why do Shards refer to themselves by their Shard name, rather than their original name? Do they still remember their original name?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes they do, they do remember their original selves( didnâ€™t get any more then that though).
